sub-events.comment: Kick off the first enemy moving.
Independent Global Timer That starts only on this layer. (Main Menu timer affects this layer and spawn rate of enemies)
Timer-SpawnRate = Actual Spawn Rate Of enemy
Every 2 seconds, but gradually reducing the interval, spawn a new enemy and move it to the target.
Every time an enemy spawn, the spawn interval reduces slightly. This makes them very gradually come faster! Make sure it doesn't go below every 0.5 seconds though.
Every time an enemy spawn, the spawn interval reduces slightly. This makes them very gradually come faster! Make sure it doesn't go below every 0.5 seconds though.
Every 10 seconds, but gradually reducing the interval, spawn a new boss enemy and move it to the target.
Every time an enemy boss spawns, the spawn interval reduces slightly. This makes them very gradually come faster! Make sure it doesn't go below every 0.5 seconds though.
Once a path has been found, start moving along it.
When bullets hit enemies, make it subtract from health and spawn some particles.
Destroy enemies with no health left, throwing in a particles effect.
When an enemy reaches the target, destroy it, but also pick a random turret and destroy that.
To include kills that are dying from overlapped enemies, we make a seperate event for destroyed enemies

sub-events.comment: Create new turrets by touching the walls.

sub-events.comment: Tell the turrets to target the enemies.
When shooting, spawn a bullet.
To prevent bullets that miss flying across the whole screen, destroy them when they've travelled out of range.
Right click towers to delete the ones that does not best fit your strategy
On start of layout, have player build turrets before starting the round.
Start the wave with this button
Fail safe if game bugs out and the counter tracker misses a kill
When all the enemies on screen are killed and the enemy counter is 0, press the green button to start a new wave
Add 2 to the tower limit to balance game with the increasing number of enemies, with every new wave
10 Tower Scraps grants you a tower supply
Button that switches current turrets on screen to another color

action.name: Set text
action.param: "The Swap Button Switches Yellow Turrets with Green and Green with Yellow for FREE!"
